title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a respectable kindergarten in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the honorable kindergarten in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Narrated by Ibn Shirin. Seeing a person in a dream that he is praying in the kindergarten, this indicates his adherence to his values, morals, and religion to God. Also, dreaming that she is praying inside the honorable kindergarten in a dream indicates her closeness to God Almighty and her repentance from sins and disobedience. Also, dreaming that he is praying inside the venerable nursery in a dream indicates that the near comfort is the abundance of money and the huge life that he will enjoy. Interpretation of seeing the honorable kindergarten in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is praying inside the honorable nursery, this indicates her close marriage. From the man she loves. As an unmarried woman sees in a dream an honorable kindergarten, it announces the loss of her worries, her closeness to God Almighty, and her salvation from the problems she sees. Also, if a girl sees in her dream an honorable kindergarten, this indicates that the dreamer will lead her on The path of justice. An unmarried girl’s dream that she is performing the noon prayer in the Prophet’s Mosque in a dream is a sign that her marriage to a righteous man is approaching. Interpretation of seeing a respectable kindergarten in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman in her dream praying in the honorable nursery indicates the stability of marital life and the abundance of livelihood without Fatigue and no trouble. Also, seeing a venerable nursery in a dream indicates her intense love for her husband, removing problems and worries, providing food and many good things. Also, seeing a respectable kindergarten in a married woman’s dream indicates success and success in study and practical and academic life. Seeing him leaving the honorable kindergarten Without prayer is a sign of corruption in morals and religion, and he must ask God for forgiveness and repent from it. Interpretation of seeing a respectable kindergarten in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is praying in an honest nursery, this indicates that her worries will go away and her birth will be easy. Also, seeing the honorable kindergarten while it is Vacuuming the pregnant woman shows psychological comfort. Seeing the venerable kindergarten in a dream means that the pregnant woman will receive a good livelihood and peace of mind and rise to the highest ranks. Interpretation of seeing the green kindergarten in a dreamIf an unmarried young man sees the green kindergarten in a dream, this is a sign of his marriage The person who is close to a girl with a beautiful face and beautiful appearance. It also indicates in a dream Hajj or Umrah. The coming period indicates the end of worries, disagreements and problems, and God knows best. A green garden in a dream also indicates adherence to the Islamic religion, repentance to God Almighty, and the death of misfortunes. If you have a dream that you want to interpret Leave it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: The 20 most important interpretations of a dream about a pregnant unmarried woman in Ibn Sirin’s dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman Pregnancy and childbirth are the dream of every married woman, but what if a single woman sees that she is pregnant in a dream? Does this vision portend evil or does it portend good? Scientists differed in answering this question, and proposed hundreds of different explanations, depending on the psychological state of the priest and the type of the fetus: Is it male or female? Accordingly, the evidence varies, and if you are interested in searching for an interpretation of a dream about an unmarried pregnant woman and seeing all the details, you can read this article.Interpretation of a dream about an unmarried pregnant woman: The interpretation of a pregnant woman’s dream may indicate her constant thinking about marriage and her desire to get married. Seeing a pregnant girl in a dream And she was sad, it could mean that she has fears and problems. If the dreamer sees that she is pregnant in his dream, she will bear a new responsibility. Ibn Shaheen interpreted the dreamer’s fiancée’s testimony that she is pregnant, as a harbinger of the success of the relationship, a happy married life, and the care of good offspring. Interpretation of a pregnant woman’s dream The unmarried woman according to Ibn Sirin: Seeing an unmarried woman who is pregnant in her fourth month in a dream symbolizes chastity, chastity, and chastity, influenced by the story of the Virgin Mary. Seeing a girl pregnant in her ninth month indicates her promotion at work and assuming an important position that suits her abilities at work. If the dreamer sees that she is pregnant in In a dream and giving birth to a beautiful girl, this is good news for success and academic, practical and social excellence. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen offers hundreds of different interpretations of seeing pregnancy in a dream and humiliation. Ibn Shaheen mentioned in interpreting a dream about pregnancy in a dream for a divorced woman that it is a sign of the beginning of a new stage in her life and overcoming difficulties. which she has gone through. Seeing a pregnant married woman in a dream is a harbinger of an abundance of goodness and abundance. If a widow sees that she is pregnant and has given birth to a child, this is a sign that one of her children will get married soon. A woman who sees in her dream that she is pregnant with a girl will see her husband’s financial condition improve and he will receive a promotion in His job. Carrying male twins in a divorced woman’s dream can portend her worsening problems and a deterioration in her psychological state. Seeing pregnancy in a man’s dream is good news for expanding his business and reaping large profits. When a married man sees that his wife is pregnant in a dream, God will bless her with a just and righteous son who will be his supporter. In the future. The barren woman who sees that she is pregnant in her dream is content with God’s will and destiny, and God will compensate her. As for the married woman who suffers from problems in childbearing, if she sees that she is pregnant in a dream, God will heal her, draw near to her, and make her happy by seeing a beautiful child. Pregnancy outside of marriage is possible. In a dream, it portends the dreamer facing severe problems and being exposed to gossip and rumors that could tarnish her reputation. I dreamed that I was pregnant and that I was alone with a small stomach. There were many gossips and differences among scholars in the interpretation of an unmarried woman’s vision that she is pregnant and her stomach is tight, as we see below: Ibn Shaheen says that the interpretation Dreaming that I was pregnant while I was single and my stomach was small indicates the dreamer’s good deeds in this world and good news in the afterlife.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing teeth in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing teeth in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Teeth in a dream refer to human life, and falling teeth can indicate the death of a close person or a problem in the dreamer’s life. In a pregnant woman, it shows her giving birth, and we must take care of our teeth. And oral health. Here you will find all the necessary information about proper care of teeth and mouth, because teeth marks in a dream can usually express what you have or you can show that you are rich with what you have access to and the secrets that you are. Hiding teeth and losing them in a dream means death or loss of job. Teeth in a dream about teeth falling out may indicate longevity, family or marital problems and conflicts, or social problems, and they may be related to childbirth for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream about seeing teeth by Ibn SirinInterpretation of dreams about seeing teeth in a dream Lower teeth: falling out in a dream is a matter of death or failure. You dream of seeing teeth in a dream of sawing teeth: You have fulfilled your expectations and shown you good livelihood and wealth. Interpretation of a dream of seeing teeth in a dream Teeth: If one’s teeth fell out in a dream and you found them, this is a wonderful thing. Fear: When you are worried about “illness or travel” and worry about losing someone Your family members, teeth falling out in your dream indicates your state of mind. The appearance of teeth in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about seeing teeth in a dream Upper teeth: If you dream of upper jaw teeth falling onto your knees or hands, you will be blessed and this may indicate a lot of money. If you are worried and in debt, then this dream is not just a sign, if he sees that your teeth are falling out one by one, then this is evidence that you will pay the debt in installments, but if he sees that your teeth are falling out. In one place means that all debts have been paid. A dream about seeing teeth in a dream. Loss of teeth If you have been suffering from fatigue and pain all your life, then jaw teeth falling out here means rest, but if teeth fall out under your control, then this is a sign of victory over competitors and enemies. Molar In a dream, falling out of the upper molars in a dream means the death of a man among your relatives, especially an old woman. If your teeth fall out in a dream, one of your relatives or neighbors will die. The lower molars in a dream represent women and resemble your family. Dream interpretation of seeing teeth in a dream Another interpretation of molars falling out means losing your money and absence Prestige among people. Dreaming of new teeth. New teeth in a dream and their appearance indicate that the number of members of your family has increased and that you will have a son or brother. New rotten teeth mean that your family has added a disabled son or brother and you will feel ashamed. Interpretation of dreams to see teeth in a dream dreaming that they fall out Your teeth are eroded and you suffer from disasters and diseases. To remove a molar in a dream. Interpretation of dreams to see teeth in a dream. One of the signs of teeth in a dream is to see molars. If you dream in your dreams that you are removing molars and watching the blood flow from the molars, then this vision means that your family will die, and if you see that the molars have fallen out and you do not see blood spots, then this is true. He. She. Code

title: Interpretation of a dream about a sister cooking in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about a sister cooking in a dream. In the following lines, we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about a sister cooking in a dream, according to the interpretations of scholars and translators and not personal interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about a sister cooking in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a sister cooking in a dream. She cooks and matures. It can be a sign of the satisfaction of desires, and God is Most High. And I know, while if the dreamer sees cooking in a dream without food, this may be evidence of his inability to achieve goals, and God knows the unseen. And if a married woman is seen cooking, this may indicate goodness and happiness, and God knows best. When you see a girl cooking, it can express luck and happiness, and God knows best. Interpretation of my sister’s dream. She hates me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams: My sister hates me in a dream could be a sign of trouble, and God knows all the unseen. If a married woman sees a sister she hates in a dream, she can express judgment, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream her sister hating her, this may be a sign of crises and problems. And God knows the unseen. If a married man sees a sister who hates him, this may lead to crises and problems, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my sister arguing with me in a dream. title: What you do not know about the interpretation of seeing a ring in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Find out the interpretation of the ring in a dream. The ring in a dream is an unpleasant vision in some cases, and sometimes it is good. The ring is a grain that grows on a small hollow stem, and before the ring takes on its usual shape, it grows as yellow flowers. The ring in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The ring is one of the plants that has There are many benefits in reality, but in a dream it has many negative connotations, which are as follows: Regret: If the dreamer is waiting for the arrival of news or something he desires, then this vision indicates that this thing will not come, and this matter will increase his depression and harm his life. Distress is known. That life is full of problems and unpleasant events, but this dream confirms a test that the dreamer will experience and will be behind his feeling of unhappiness for a long time, he will live with difficulty. Dengue fever: One must save his money to protect himself from poverty, but this dream, as Ibn Sirin confirms, confirms that misery will It is a title for the dreamer’s life and he may be forced into religion. It is not fair: One of the worst feelings that a person experiences is the feeling of injustice and the usurpation of a right. This is a major disaster and can cause him to lose balance in his life in general. Unfortunately, the meaning of this dream is that the dreamer will find someone in his life who violates him and corrects him, or he may get involved in some problems and find someone who bears false witness, as the injustices are many, but in the end it is a disaster that will come to the dreamer soon. Loss: This dream is interpreted as loss and loss, as it may be Losing a spouse, a job, or a person who helped the dreamer suddenly loses him, perhaps due to death or abandonment, and the most serious type of loss is the loss of pleasure and tranquility in life, and this will happen to everyone who saw this vision, and after presenting all the bad meanings, Ibn Sirin explained that the dream could Interpreted with all joyful symbols If the dreamer sees himself cooking fenugreek, from here we can announce to the dreamer that all misfortune and evil will be completely removed from him, in addition to the fulfillment of many interests and needs. From his near recovery, the sad person will sleep peacefully without thinking and his pillow will be wet with tears. Ibn Sirin indicated that the Magat ring is a sign of superiority after many stumbles and dilemmas that the dreamer went through. The ring in a dream by Al-Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation did not differ from Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing the ring, but he added It has only three interpretations: The first interpretation: If a single man sees in his dream that he is drinking from a cup filled with grass, this is a sign that his wife will come from a distinguished family and will have an excellent position in the city. The second interpretation: If the fenugreek appears in liquid form, then this is food, but if They appeared raw in the form of solid grains, so this is a sign of distress and failure in life. The third interpretation: If the dreamer is counting fenugreek seeds in a dream, this is a sign that things will not be easy and the situation will stop. Interpretation of the ring in a dream When an unmarried girl sees the ring in a dream, the Its interpretation is anxiety, problems and misfortunes. Seeing a married woman in a ring in a dream means divorce and sometimes it is interpreted as a lack of livelihood and loss of money and sometimes as betrayal or separation.
preview.text: Find out the interpretation of the ring in a dream. The ring in a dream is an unpleasant vision in some cases, and sometimes it is good. The ring is a grain that grows on a small hollow stem, and before the ring takes on its usual shape, it grows as yellow flowers. The ring in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The ring is one of the plants that has There are many benefits in reality, but in a dream it has many negative connotations, which are as follows: Regret: If the dreamer is waiting for the arrival of news or something he desires, then this vision indicates that this thing will not come, and this matter will increase his depression and harm his life. Distress is known. That life is full of problems and unpleasant events, but this dream confirms a test that the dreamer will experience and will be behind his feeling of unhappiness for a long time, he will live with difficulty. Dengue fever: One must save his money to protect himself from poverty, but this dream, as Ibn Sirin confirms, confirms that misery will It is a title for the dreamer’s life and he may be forced into religion. It is not fair: One of the worst feelings that a person experiences is the feeling of injustice and the usurpation of a right. This is a major disaster and can cause him to lose balance in his life in general. Unfortunately, the meaning of this dream is that the dreamer will find someone in his life who violates him and corrects him, or he may get involved in some problems and find someone who bears false witness, as the injustices are many, but in the end it is a disaster that will come to the dreamer soon. Loss: This dream is interpreted as loss and loss, as it may be Losing a spouse, a job, or a person who helped the dreamer suddenly loses him, perhaps due to death or abandonment, and the most serious type of loss is the loss of pleasure and tranquility in life, and this will happen to everyone who saw this vision, and after presenting all the bad meanings, Ibn Sirin explained that the dream could Interpreted with all joyful symbols If the dreamer sees himself cooking fenugreek, from here we can announce to the dreamer that all misfortune and evil will be completely removed from him, in addition to the fulfillment of many interests and needs. From his near recovery, the sad person will sleep peacefully without thinking and his pillow will be wet with tears. Ibn Sirin indicated that the Magat ring is a sign of superiority after many stumbles and dilemmas that the dreamer went through. The ring in a dream by Al-Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation did not differ from Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing the ring, but he added It has only three interpretations: The first interpretation: If a single man sees in his dream that he is drinking from a cup filled with grass, this is a sign that his wife will come from a distinguished family and will have an excellent position in the city. The second interpretation: If the fenugreek appears in liquid form, then this is food, but if They appeared raw in the form of solid grains, so this is a sign of distress and failure in life. The third interpretation: If the dreamer is counting fenugreek seeds in a dream, this is a sign that things will not be easy and the situation will stop. Interpretation of the ring in a dream When an unmarried girl sees the ring in a dream, the Its interpretation is anxiety, problems and misfortunes. Seeing a married woman in a ring in a dream means divorce and sometimes it is interpreted as a lack of livelihood and loss of money and sometimes as betrayal or separation.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a needle in a dream?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a needle in a dream? A needle is a sewing tool, for sewing different clothes, and seeing it in a dream indicates a change in the dreamer’s life for the better, correcting mistakes and repenting from sin, and also indicates the end of problems and troubles. Frequency of the On Time Sports channel. Interpretation of a dream about removing a needle from the bed. Seeing a needle that was removed from the bed indicates good character and the dreamer’s distance from backbiting and gossip. Seeing a needle being removed from the bed in the dream of an unmarried young man indicates that the young man is approaching marriage. Interpretation of a dream about needles In clothes, I mean seeing losing a needle in a dream means not fulfilling desires. It is the opinion that he sews clothing items with a needle in a dream, this is a sign of the goodness of his life and the end of problems and suffering. If a poor person dreams that he sews his clothes with a needle, this is a sign that he will change his profession and get a lot of money. Maine KraftInterpretation of a dream about removing needles from clothes. Seeing a needle removed from clothes indicates correcting mistakes committed by an individual. Many needles in a dream for a single woman. If a girl sees a single woman, a needle in her dream is a sign of her marriage to a wealthy man. As evidenced by seeing a needle inside an individual family, for positive changes in her life for the better. Such as getting a prestigious job that he dreamed of.. What if an unmarried woman saw that she was sewing her clothes with a needle, this indicates that she will be free of troubles and troubles, and if there is an engagement and problems occur, these problems will be solved. Many needles in a dream for a divorced woman. Seeing many needles in a complete dream It indicates a prestigious job. And if she sees that she is sewing her own clothes, this indicates the goodness of her life by returning to her ex-husband if there is hope for his return. SSC channel frequency Interpretation of a dream about a needle in the hand The needle in the hand may be one of the signs of the owner entering the dream into major problems, such as the accumulation of debts or financial difficulties. See entry The needle in the hand A man can be a warning sign for this man if he is earning forbidden money from his work. It also indicates the entry The needle in the hand In the presence of a bad friend in the friend’s life The dream creates a lot of problems for him. Simulator Interpretation of a dream about a needle for a married woman If a married woman sees in her dream, a needle This indicates Indicates that she will get pregnant soon. As indicated by Seeing the needle, a married woman travels in a dream with her husband. Seeing the loss of a needle In a dream, a married woman can indicate fatigue, suffering, and lack of financial resources. Jokes Interpretation of a dream about a medical needle in the hand of a married woman Medical needle in a dream For married people It is a good vision, if it is Needle, healthy and clean. It expresses About the goodness and provision of God and her family. Download A medical needle in the muscle of a married woman is a sign of great goodness and benefit that the dreamer will gain after a period of distress and severe anxiety. Crochet needle in a dream Seeing a crochet needle in a dream may indicate the curiosity of the seer or fortune teller and to spying and conveying words. And to be exposed to adversity. And for the big problem due to the transmission of the word. A set of needles in a dream for a single woman. Look at

title: Interpretation of a dream about long black hair

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about long black hair in different situations: A woman’s hair is the crown of her beauty that she hides from many people for fear of being influenced by hatred or envy, and she cares a lot about it to appear this long and shiny. A woman with long hair does not want to cut it or even straighten its ends, she wants it to be Very long all the time, so long black hair is sure to have many interpretations and associations that every girl will love. To find out, follow us.Interpretation of a dream about black hair by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that black hair in a dream is a symbol of abundance of money and a long life for the dreamer, but interpretations differ depending on the situation in which the viewer sees his hair in the dream, and the interpretation differs from that. From one person to another according to the condition of the fortuneteller himself. If the dreamer is one of the rich, then the long black hair is his money and possessions, but if he is righteous, then the black hair in the dream is a sign of his piety and faith, but if he is poor, then the long black hair could be a sign of the sins he has committed. In his life. Seeing long black hair on a woman is considered one of the praiseworthy visions that foretells the good that she will achieve, God willing, and the good news that she will hear. Increasing the length of the hair in a dream is a sign of increasing sustenance that Almighty God grants to the dreamer, and it may also be a sign of status or position. The high status that the dreamer will attain in his life. If the dreamer finds that his hair is beautiful and long in a dream and is distinguished by its softness, then this is a sign of pride and pride that the dreamer will acquire, God willing. The sign of division, division, and long black hair is a sign of happiness that will overwhelm the dreamer in life. Interpretation of a dream about long black hair for single womenIf an unmarried girl finds that her hair has become long, beautiful, and black in color, this is a sign that she will soon meet the knight of her dreams and will have a very long love relationship with him. She will eventually be crowned with a husband, if God wants. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that someone is combing her hair and she is in a state of happiness and admiration, this is good news for her and her marriage, and it is also an indication that she will have a lot of fun. Happy married life with him. But if an unmarried girl sees that someone cut her long black hair in a dream, then this dream does not bode well at all, as it is a sign of a bad person with whom she has an unmarried relationship, turning her life into sadness. And the fatigue that hardens her and destroys her youth. Interpretation of a dream about long black hair for a married woman: If a married woman sees that her hair has become long, soft, and black in color, this is good news for her to increase her livelihood and enjoy marital happiness and an easy life, and it is also a sign of her beauty, regardless of age. . It is. If a married woman sees that her partner has long, black hair, this is a sign that she will obtain good offspring that she will have from her husband, and it is one of the reasons for the happiness and high status that the husband will gain. And that this child inherits good morals from his parents. Interpretation of a dream about long black hair for bitter people

title: Interpretation of seeing a car with a person in a dream in detail

preview.html: Dreaming of riding in a car with someone symbolizes a beneficial partnership and abundant livelihood. Seeing a car with a familiar face in the front seat in a dream may indicate strong relationships that lead to mutual benefits. Being exposed to some harassment that will end soon, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a car with someone in a dream. Driving a car with someone in a dream symbolizes partnerships and mutual benefits with this person. Interpretation of dreams of driving a car with someone can indicate living on a large scale and achieving goals and objectives. Driving a car Cleaning with someone in a dream is evidence of gaining benefits and a good reputation from dealing with this person. Seeing a luxury car with someone in a dream, this person is a reason to gain a high status and good reputation, and a dream of driving a race car with someone indicates participating in a strong competition to gain an advantage. Whoever sees that he is riding in a car with someone and an accident occurs in the dream, then he is reckless in his decisions. Dreaming that you are driving with someone and the car overturns indicates a change in relationships with others and in intentions. Seeing someone driving you home in his car in a dream means that you will get... Help to settle down in your life. A dream about someone driving you home may indicate that you will receive protection and care from this person. If the dreamer sees in his life a dream about someone driving his car to work, his wages will increase and he will get a job with the help of others, and God knows best. Interpretation of driving a car with a familiar person in a dream indicates a dream Driving in a car with a familiar person indicates that you are entering into a business with him that brings with him many benefits and blessings. Also, riding in a car with someone you know in a dream is a sign of highness and status among people. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is driving a car with someone he knows from his relatives, then this Evidence of the family’s good reputation before the people. The dream may indicate the connection of relatives, and the dream of driving in a car with relatives and being involved in an accident indicates major problems and disagreements that the dreamer experiences with his family and relatives. A dream of riding in a car with a brother shows solidarity and assistance in obtaining benefits, and whoever sees that he is riding in a car with his sister in a dream This is evidence of joy and pleasure in the dreamer’s life, and seeing a trip with parents in a car in a dream indicates improved family relationships and family and psychological comfort. Seeing a car ride with a friend or girlfriend in a dream indicates common interests between them, and a dream about driving in a friend’s car may indicate To that you benefit from his position and reputation among people. To dream that you are driving a white car with someone you know means getting rid of stress and feeling psychological comfort, and dreaming of driving a white car with a familiar person may indicate that you are hearing good news from that person, under the condition that the car is clean. . Driving in a white car dirty with mud and mud with a well-known person in a dream is evidence that he is falling into great temptation. Dreaming of driving a black car with a familiar face indicates good news about wealth and a change in circumstances for the better. Interpretation of driving a car with one’s mother in a dream: The dream is that...

title: Interpretation of seeing a frog in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFansInterpretation of seeing a frog in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi. A frog is an amphibious vertebrate animal that lives in a semi-aquatic environment, and seeing a frog in a dream has many different interpretations that change according to the color of the frog and toad. The situation in which it appears and in this article we will show you all the possible interpretations of seeing a frog in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a frog for a single womanIf an unmarried woman sees a frog in a dream, this indicates the presence of a virtuous man in the life of his companion in the dream, who will approach her and take care of her. As for To see? A black frog in a dream, this indicates selfishness and greed. As for seeing a large frog in a dream, this dream does not indicate kindness, unlike seeing a small frog, it indicates happiness and joy. Interpretation of a dream about a frog for a married woman. A married woman sees a frog in a dream, this dream is good. It portends great power, especially if the frog is small, as this indicates happiness, joy, and good luck. Interpretation of a dream about a frog for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman who sees a frog in a dream, this dream indicates problems and difficulties that the woman faces throughout her pregnancy. Seeing a black frog can be in The dream is a sign that the birth is male, and God knows best. In general, the opinion of a small frog in a dream, this indicates joy and pleasure. Seeing a large frog indicates the problems and difficulties that you face. Interpretation of seeing a large frog in a dream. Seeing a large frog in a dream, this indicates kindness and great wealth. If you see a frog jumping In a dream, then this dream is a sign of traveling soon. Seeing a frog biting in a dream, this dream is good for the dreamer. If you see a frog in bed, then this dream is a sign of a short pregnancy for a married woman. In general, commentators unanimously say that seeing a big frog in a dream It indicates happiness and the opening of a great door for goodness for the dreamer. Seeing a cooked frog in a dream is a good omen and indicates happiness. Interpretation of seeing a small frog in a dreamA small frog in a dream, this dream indicates happiness and joy for the dreamer, and the dream may indicate traveling or performing Hajj and achieving what You want. There are those who interpreted seeing a small frog in a dream as indicating greed and selfishness. Interpretation of seeing a black, green, and white frog in a dream. Seeing a green frog in a dream indicates a wise and prudent person and can indicate success, excellence, and achieving what one desires. Seeing a black frog In a dream, it means envy, stubbornness, and hypocrisy. As for whoever sees in a dream that he is killing a black frog, this dream is good for the dreamer. Seeing a white frog in a dream is a dream that indicates good luck for the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing a frog in a dream by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin, who interprets seeing a frog in a dream, indicates A person who practices in this world and indicates obedience to God. Whoever sees in a dream that he is accompanying a frog in a dream, this indicates the company of relatives and neighbors. As for eating a frog in a dream, this dream indicates a good and small benefit for relatives and friends. And whoever chases a frog in his dream, this indicates Injustice. Whoever sees in a dream that he has been bitten
